newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Kenmare in second gold venture in Yugoslavia.
newsitem.headline: Kenmare in second gold venture in Yugoslavia.

text.p: Irish mineral firm Kenmare Resources Plc said on Monday it signed a second joint venture for gold exploration and development in Yugoslavia.
Kenmare said it would control the board of the joint venture with Geoinstitut, a geological institute with minerals licences.
Projects for exploration included Deli Jovan, on a major gold and copper bearing belt in the Balkans, and Ruplje.
Kenmare said the venture would act in parallel with its previously-announced gold exploration deal with Gemini, its other alliance in Yugoslavia.
